name: Spent Casings (Markus Franz)
description:
Spent Casings: Made in 6 days for 7DFPS-2022 A short one level game about shootin' dudes.

This was the first attempt at making some kind of First Person Shooter for me, it's still very buggy and unfinished.

But hey that's a game jam for ya.

Credits:
All music and SFX by Mark The Chef
